description: This file provides configuration helper functions that read environment variables (specifically React app environment variables) to determine URLs and log levels for a robot task control panel frontend. It contains functions to retrieve API base URLs, WebSocket URLs, and log level settings with safe defaults.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the base URL for REST API calls, prioritizing environment variables 'REACT_APP_API_BASE' and 'REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL', with a fallback to an empty string.

methods.name: getWsUrl()
methods.description: Returns the WebSocket URL from environment variable 'REACT_APP_WS_URL', or an empty string if not configured.

methods.name: getLogLevel()
methods.description: Returns the log level string ('debug', 'info', 'warn', 'error'), defaulting to 'info' if not specified.
